translations.en: This is an interesting book.
He is buying a fashionable bag.
translations.ro: El cumpără o geantă la modă.

translations.en: This is a small dog.
I see the green tree.
We are buying new modern chairs.
I am wearing a long coat.
We see the black cats.

question: Ich gebe dem ____ Kind ein Geschenk. (brav)

translations.en: I am giving the well-behaved child a gift.
These are old books.

question: Die Schüler lernen mit einem ____ Lehrer. (erfahren)

translations.en: The students are learning with an experienced teacher.
translations.ro: Elevii învață cu un profesor experimentat.
translations.ar: يتعلم الطلاب مع معلم ذو خبرة.

question: Der ____ Regen hat die Straßen überflutet. (stark)

translations.en: The heavy rain has flooded the streets.

question: Ich mag die ____ Luft nach dem Regen. (frisch)

translations.en: I like the fresh air after the rain.
translations.uk: Мені подобається свіже повітря після дощу.
translations.ro: Îmi place aerul proaspăt după ploaie.

translations.en: The bright sun is shining in the sky.

question: Der ____ Himmel verspricht einen schönen Tag. (klar)

translations.en: The clear sky promises a beautiful day.
translations.ro: Cerul clar promite o zi frumoasă.

translations.en: We are hiking through the dark forest.
I am buying a new refrigerator.
The old washing machine is broken.
translations.ro: Mașina de spălat veche este stricată.

translations.en: He is using a powerful vacuum cleaner.
The broken iron does not work.
translations.ro: Fierul de călcat stricat nu funcționează.

question: Ich brauche eine ____ Lampe für das Wohnzimmer. (hell)

translations.en: I need a bright lamp for the living room.
translations.uk: Мені потрібна яскрава лампа для вітальні.
translations.ro: Am nevoie de o lampă strălucitoare pentru sufragerie.
translations.ar: أحتاج إلى مصباح ساطع لغرفة المعيشة.

translations.en: She is wearing a red dress.
I am buying a beautiful bag.
The old hat belongs to me.
He is wearing a white shirt.
I am putting on my new shoes.
She is wearing a warm jacket.
I am eating a green apple.
We are drinking a cold juice.
This is fresh bread.
We are buying fresh red tomatoes.
He is eating a hot soup.

question: Ich nehme ein ____ Ei zum Frühstück. (gekocht)

translations.en: I am having a boiled egg for breakfast.
translations.uk: Я їм варене яйце на сніданок.
translations.ro: Ia un ou fiert la micul dejun.

translations.en: We are traveling by a fast train.
I am renting a new car.
The large airplane is landing soon.
The fast ferry is crossing the river.

question: Wir steigen in einen ____ Bus ein. (leer)

translations.en: We are boarding an empty bus.
I am booking an international flight.
I am reading an exciting book.
The teacher gives a difficult task.
I am writing with a blue pen.
This is a large blackboard.
The students are taking an important exam.
The bright classroom is clean.
The wide river flows quickly.
We admire the high mountains.
I am sitting under an old tree.
This is a hot desert.

question: Der ____ See ist bekannt für seine Schönheit. (tief)

translations.en: The deep lake is known for its beauty.
translations.ro: Lacul adânc este cunoscut pentru frumusețea sa.

translations.en: I am photographing the colorful flowers.
We are playing on a large field.

question: Der ____ Ball ist schwer zu werfen. (schwer)

translations.en: The heavy ball is difficult to throw.
translations.ro: Mingea grea este dificil de aruncat.

translations.en: I am buying new sporty shoes.
The players are wearing colorful jerseys.
This is an exciting competition.
We are running through the green park.
I am writing an important report.
This is a large desk.
We have a boring meeting.
She is working with a modern computer.
translations.ar: إنها تعمل على جهاز كمبيوتر حديث.

translations.en: The employees have a daily meeting.
This is a new printer.
We are eating fresh red apples.
This is fresh bread.
I am drinking sweet cold milk.
The warm soup is delicious.
I am ordering a strong coffee.
The children are eating delicious cake.
We are watching an exciting movie.
This is a funny book.
We are listening to a beautiful song.

question: Die Kinder spielen mit einem ____ Ball. (bunt)

translations.en: The children are playing with a colorful ball.
translations.ro: Copiii se joacă cu o minge colorată.

translations.en: The entertaining show was enjoyed by everyone.
translations.ro: Spectacolul de divertisment a fost pe placul tuturor.

translations.en: We are visiting a famous circus.
I have started a healthy diet.

question: Ich trage bequeme ____ Schuhe beim Laufen. (leicht)

translations.en: I wear comfortable lightweight shoes while running.
translations.uk: Я ношу зручне легке взуття під час бігу.
translations.ro: Port pantofi ușori confortabili la alergat.
translations.ar: أرتدي أحذية خفيفة ومريحة أثناء الجري.

translations.en: We are training in a modern gym.
translations.uk: Ми тренуємося в сучасному тренажерному залі.
translations.ro: Ne antrenăm într-o sală de sport modernă.
translations.ar: نحن نتدرب في صالة رياضية حديثة.

question: Das ist ein ____ Getränk nach dem Training. (kalt)

translations.en: This is a cold drink after training.
translations.ro: Acesta este o băutură rece după antrenament.

question: Er macht eine ____ Übung für die Muskeln. (schwer)

translations.en: He is doing a difficult exercise for the muscles.
translations.uk: Він виконує важку вправу для м’язів.
translations.ro: Face un exercițiu greu pentru mușchi.

question: Wir machen einen ____ Spaziergang im Park. (langsam)

translations.en: We are taking a slow walk in the park.
translations.uk: Ми здійснюємо повільну прогулянку в парку.
translations.ro: Facem o plimbare lentă în parc.

translations.en: We are hiking through a green forest.
This is a high mountain.
We are enjoying the beautiful landscape.
We are sitting by a calm river.

question: Die ____ Strände sind beliebt bei Touristen. (weiß)

translations.en: The white beaches are popular with tourists.
translations.ro: Plajele albe sunt populare printre turiști.

question: Wir bewundern die ____ Blumen im Garten. (bunt)

translations.en: We admire the colorful flowers in the garden.
translations.uk: Ми захоплюємося яскравими квітами в саду.
translations.ar: نحن نعجب بالزهور الملونة في الحديقة.

translations.en: I have an older brother.
She has a younger sister.
translations.ro: Ea are o soră mai mică.

translations.en: These are our lovely grandparents.
translations.uk: Це наші люблячі дідусь і бабуся.

translations.en: My father is a strong man.
translations.ro: Tatăl meu este un bărbat puternic.

translations.en: I have a friendly aunt.
This is my funny cousin.
We have a competent teacher.
She is reading an interesting book.
These are our hardworking students.
We are sitting in a clean classroom.
translations.uk: Ми сидимо в чистій класній кімнаті.
translations.ro: Stăm într-o sală de clasă curată.
translations.ar: نحن نجلس في فصل دراسي نظيف.

translations.en: We are writing a long essay.
This is an important exam.
